content:
You have decided to build 100 housing units to increase population.

Building 100 housing units will cost $50000*100 = $5000000 and will increase the population by 100*20 = 2000 people.

The new city status:
Population: 5210 (increased by 2000)
Funds: -45000000
Income: 1000000 + tax revenue (72% happiness \* $1000/resident)
Education Level: 61%
Employment Rate: 85%
Crime Rate: 8%
Health Level: 30%
Birth rate: 6.625%
Happiness level: 72%
Tax Revenue: $241250 (72% happiness \* $1000/resident)

Please let me know if you want to make any other actions in your city.
